attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Too much money is spent demonising a drug which is only psychologically damaging to a tiny percentage of users.

Considering the possible side-effects of prescribed medication; cannabis is a natural and safe relaxant.

There is too much political friction surrounding this issue because the so-called 'experts' have no idea what they're talking about.

We hard-working tax payers should be allowed to enjoy a Friday evening without needing to resort to alcohol, which is arguably a much harder drug.

Cannabis is natural and good, now leave us alone to enjoy it.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
